text: The new Defence Attach of the Chinese Embassy in Sri Lanka, Senior Colonel Xu Jianwei met the State Minister of Defence Hon. Ruwan Wijewardene at the Ministry yesterday (03rd January 2016).Cordial discussions were held between State Minister Wijewardene and the Chinese Defence Attach on matters of bilateral importance and mutual relevance during the meeting.The State Minister also presented a memento to the visiting Defence Attach to mark the occasion.
title: Chinese Defence Attach meets State Minister
